item.title: Tina add a quote by Mark Z. Danielewski
Tina add a quote by Mark Z. Danielewski
item.description: "This is not for you." -- Mark Z. Danielewski

item.title: Tina add a quote by Mark Z. Danielewski
Tina add a quote by Meat Loaf
item.description: "The blood of the guitar was Chuck Berry red." -- Meat Loaf

item.title: Tina add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Tina add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Tina add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Tina add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Tina add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Without deviation from the norm, progress is not possible." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Tina add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Without music to decorate it, time is just a bunch of boring production deadlines or dates by which bills must be paid." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Tina add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "If you want to get laid, go to college. If you want an education, go to the library." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Tina add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Information is not knowledge. Knowledge is not wisdom. Wisdom is not truth. Truth is not beauty. Beauty is not love. Love is not music. Music is THE BEST." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Tina add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "There is more stupidity than hydrogen in the universe, and it has a longer shelf life." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Tina add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "You can't be a real country unless you have a beer and an airline - it helps if you have some kind of football team, or some nuclear weapons, but in the very least you need a beer." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Tina add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Interviewer: 'So Frank, you have long hair. Does that make you a woman?' Frank Zappa: 'You have a wooden leg. Does that make you a table?" -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Tina add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "The price of meat has just gone up and your old lady has just gone down." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Tina add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Art is making something out of nothing, and selling it." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Tina add a quote by Kathy Acker
item.description: "i am a limitless series of natural disasters and all of these disasters have been unnaturally repressed." -- Kathy Acker
